title: Ribbon steak with chicory and anchovy dressing
description: Give your steak dinner a touch of sophistication with a crisp chicory salad and simple anchovy dressing.
ingredients: 30g/1oz brown anchovies tinned in oil, drained (reserve the oil)
flaky sea salt and black pepper
250g/9oz sirloin steak, fat trimmed off, thinly sliced into ribbons
